original_text: Then take my silver cup and put it in the top of the youngest man's bag. Put it with the money that he brought to pay for his food.’ The servant did what Joseph had told him to do.
korean_text: 또 내 잔 곧 은잔을 그 청년의 자루 아귀에 넣고 그 양식 값 돈도 함께 넣으라 하매 그가 요셉의 명령대로 하고

sentences.original_text: and put it in the top of the youngest man's bag
sentences.korean_translation: 막내 아들의 자루 맨 위에 넣어라

sentences.original_text: that he brought to pay for his food
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 양식 값을 주기 위해 가져온

sentences.original_text: The servant did what Joseph had told him to do
